widgetsBundle.title: Analogue gauges
widgetsBundle.description: Display temperature, humidity, speed, and other latest values on various analog gauge widgets.

widgetTypes.name: Compass
widgetTypes.description: Displays latest value of the attribute or timeseries key on the compass. Expects value to be in range of 0 to 360.

widgetTypes.name: Thermometer scale
widgetTypes.description: Preconfigured widget to display temperature. Allows to configure temperature range, gradient colors and other settings.

widgetTypes.name: Temperature radial gauge
widgetTypes.description: Preconfigured gauge to display temperature. Allows to configure temperature range, gradient colors and other settings.

widgetTypes.name: Speed gauge
widgetTypes.description: Preconfigured gauge to display speed. Allows to configure speed range, gradient colors and other settings.

widgetTypes.name: Radial gauge
widgetTypes.description: Preconfigured gauge to display any value reading. Allows to configure value range, gradient colors and other settings.
